data <- readLines("data/2023-01.txt")

get_number <- function(x) {
  str_number <- gsub("[^0-9]", "", x)
  len <- nchar(str_number)
  str_number <- paste0(substr(str_number, 1, 1), substr(str_number, len, len))
  return(as.numeric(str_number))
}
numbers <- vapply(
  data, 
  get_number,
  numeric(1)
)

sum(numbers)
